monsterSpeed: Speed 30 ft., burrow 20 ft., climb 30 ft.
monsterLanguages: Languages understands Draconic but can't speak it
monsterSpecials: Source. Volo's Guide to Monsters, p. 158
monsterActions: Multiattack. The drake attacks twice, once with its bite and once with its tail.
Bite. Melee Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 7 (1d8+3) piercing damage.
Tail. Melee Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 6 (1d6+3) bludgeoning damage.
